summary: BuildRequest states no changes and no requirements. The only modified file is project_state.json, which adds/updates a set of Valentine-page features and references REQ-1..REQ-6 that were not part of the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/recorded a set of Valentine page requirements/features (REQ-1 through REQ-6) and a summary describing an interactive Valentine web page with evasive "No" and "Yes" meme reveal, despite the BuildRequest explicitly requesting no changes and listing no requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest: "Valentine surprise single-page prompt (no changes requested; already implemented)" and "Requirements: none". Diff shows new/updated feature entries mapped to REQ-1..REQ-6 and a new summary of functionality.
